sentences.sContent: Of course, anyone knows that it is impossible to play a symphonic work with just three strings.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of course, anyone knows that it is impossible to play a symphonic work with just three strings.
sentences.sCn: 当然，每个人都知道，只用三根弦来演奏交响乐是不可能的。

sentences.sContent: The orchestra had been planning a British symphonic celebration with Hickox for 2010, and a Britten celebration for the Olympic year, 2012.
sentences.sContent_eng: The orchestra had been planning a British symphonic celebration with Hickox for 2010, and a Britten celebration for the Olympic year, 2012.
sentences.sCn: 乐团正与希考克斯一 起计划2010年的英国交响乐盛典，还有2012年奥运年的布里顿庆典。

sentences.sContent: In fact, when the symphonic stars align, classical music concerts make for quite brilliant theatre.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, when the symphonic stars align, classical music concerts make for quite brilliant theatre.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，当那些交响明星们整装登场之时，古典音乐会也是场绝伦的表演。

synos.tran: 交响乐的；交响性的；和声的

trans.tranOther: Symphonic means relating to or like a symphony
